query: mutation updateCourseType($command: UpdateCourseTypeCommandInput!) { updateCourseType(command: $command) { ...courseType __typename } } fragment courseType on CourseType { reference description vatRule { ...vatRule __typename } costCentreFinancialDimension { ...financialDimension __typename } projectFinancialDimension { ...financialDimension __typename } examPreparation { ...examPreparation __typename } studyMode { ...studyMode __typename } isCba createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename } fragment vatRule on VatRule { reference code description rate createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename } fragment financialDimension on FinancialDimension { reference code description target dimensionType createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename } fragment examPreparation on ExamPreparation { reference name description createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename } fragment studyMode on StudyMode { reference name description createdBy createdOn updatedBy updatedOn __typename }
